short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides some enhancement to the CRM System of Carrier Midea India Private Limited website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview

This extension allows to the users of cmiservice.co.in website add some enhancement and some extra functionalities.

Change Log (v1.4.0)
* Enhance PM Schedule List

Change Log (v1.3.1)
* Bug fixes

Change Log (v1.2.0)
* Payout Advice format restructured for compatibility with MS Word

Change Log (v1.0.0)
* ASP can configure their details after Installing
* Modified the format of Jobsheet
* Blank Jobsheet can also be printed
